views.view: SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Group [CodeFirstDatabaseSchema.Group](T1.Group_Id, T1.Group_Name, T1.Group_Description) FROM ( SELECT T.Id AS Group_Id, T.Name AS Group_Name, T.Description AS Group_Description, True AS _from0 FROM TestContext.Groups AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing User [CodeFirstDatabaseSchema.User](T1.User_Id, T1.User_FirstName, T1.User_Surname) FROM ( SELECT T.Id AS User_Id, T.FirstName AS User_FirstName, T.Surname AS User_Surname, True AS _from0 FROM TestContext.Users AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing GroupUser [CodeFirstDatabaseSchema.GroupUser](T1.GroupUser_Group, T1.GroupUser_User) FROM ( SELECT Key(T.Group_Users_Source).Id AS GroupUser_Group, Key(T.Group_Users_Target).Id AS GroupUser_User, True AS _from0 FROM TestContext.Group_Users AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Groups [Mvp.Passive.View.Base.Database.Group](T1.Group_Id, T1.Group_Name, T1.Group_Description) FROM ( SELECT T.Id AS Group_Id, T.Name AS Group_Name, T.Description AS Group_Description, True AS _from0 FROM CodeFirstDatabase.[Group] AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Users [Mvp.Passive.View.Base.Database.User](T1.User_Id, T1.User_FirstName, T1.User_Surname) FROM ( SELECT T.Id AS User_Id, T.FirstName AS User_FirstName, T.Surname AS User_Surname, True AS _from0 FROM CodeFirstDatabase.User AS T ) AS T1

SELECT VALUE -- Constructing Group_Users [Mvp.Passive.View.Base.Database.Group_Users](T3.[Group_Users.Group_Users_Source], T3.[Group_Users.Group_Users_Target]) FROM ( SELECT -- Constructing Group_Users_Source CreateRef(TestContext.Groups, row(T2.[Group_Users.Group_Users_Source.Id]), [Mvp.Passive.View.Base.Database.Group]) AS [Group_Users.Group_Users_Source], T2.[Group_Users.Group_Users_Target] FROM ( SELECT -- Constructing Group_Users_Target T1.[Group_Users.Group_Users_Source.Id], CreateRef(TestContext.Users, row(T1.[Group_Users.Group_Users_Target.Id]), [Mvp.Passive.View.Base.Database.User]) AS [Group_Users.Group_Users_Target] FROM ( SELECT T.[Group] AS [Group_Users.Group_Users_Source.Id], T.User AS [Group_Users.Group_Users_Target.Id], True AS _from0 FROM CodeFirstDatabase.GroupUser AS T ) AS T1 ) AS T2 ) AS T3
